text: Sokolniki Exhibition and Convention Centre is a convention centre in Moscow, Russia. It is in Sokolniki Park. The convention hall was opened in 1959. It was the first commercial hall after the opening of the All-Russia Exhibition Centre in 1935. == Other websites == *Sokolniki Exhibition and Convention Centre *International Exhibition of Calligraphy *Our Victory *Contemporary Museum of Calligraphy *The first handwritten Constitution of the Russian Federation Category:Convention and exhibition centers in Moscow
title: Sokolniki Exhibition and Convention Centre
